page.title: 08Shops in Aston Clinton
page.content: Shops in our area cater for immediate needs but most people shop in main shopping areas such as TRING and AYLESBURY. The shops in our area also cater for old people who can't get into the main shopping area but the problem is that the prices are rather high. The main shops in our area are MACE, VG, CORNER SHOP, POST OFFICE and THE HANDY STORES. COOKS, MACE, VG and THE CORNER SHOP are supermarkets. They sell confectionery, stationery, groceries and toys. The Post Office sells the same except for groceries, and it runs a postal service. The Handy Store sells things like DIY kits, torches, lightbulbs, wellies, body warmers,gardening materials and a few toys as well as a key cutting service and a photo copying service.
